page.title: 08Social Survey C-Amenities(2)
page.content: People were also asked :{"Please {state any other important amenities {which should be provided."} Here is a summary of their comments: _"A hard-surfaced,fenced area where ball games can be played behind the Village Hall. This could then also be used as a car park for the Hall." _"A sports centre at Tenterden or Cranbrook to serve the rural area." _"A Cub pack or Scout troop in the village." _"A local resident doctor's surgery." _"A better bus service to Rolvenden Layne." _"We could do with a phone box at Gatefield." _"A mains gas supply to Rolvenden Layne." _"30 m.p.h. signs should start at the beginning of the built-up area into the village."
